description: This file defines a React component 'Loyalty' that manages and displays a list of loyalty accounts, allowing editing of points and tier information. It fetches data from an API, supports updating entries, and renders a table UI.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches loyalty account data from the API and updates the state.

methods.name: startEdit
methods.description: Initializes editing mode for a specific loyalty record.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Saves the updated loyalty data back to the API.
